properties.description: How many rows do we have?

content.query:
-- How many rows do we have?

SELECT
    COUNT(1)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://demosynapsedls01.dfs.core.windows.net/europesoccer/curated/game_events.parquet/part-00000-58db940b-487b-4302-98c3-fa612cd07044-c000.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
